summary: PREMATURE TRANSMISSION MECHATRONIC FAILURE.  CAR UNABLE TO REVERSE DURING A 3 POINT TURN IN A ROADWAY ACROSS TRAIN TRACKS.  SINCE NEW THE CAR HAD A CLUNKY TRANSMISSION. IT PROGRESSIVELY GOT WORSE BUT WHEN BROUGHT TO THE DEALER IT WAS ALWAYS, "OPERATING WITHIN MANUFACTURER'S SPECIFICATIONS"  THIS IS THE 2ND AUDI IN A ROW THAT HAS BEEN BROUGHT IN MULTIPLE TIMES FOR A PROBLEM THAT THE DEALER CLAIMS ISN'T A PROBLEM AND IS "OPERATING IN SPECS OF THE MANUFACTURER".
